body.name: Cromorc 3MP Surveillance Bullet Camera Weatherproof Outdoor Indoor 3.6mm Lens IR Cut Day&Night Vision with 5DB Antenna with Bracket with Power Adapter Built-in Microphone
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 16 mins
features: This camera cannot work separately, should works with Cromorc NVR system. Please confirm with us if you want to use it with other brands' NVR.
Wireless and wired connections are optional.

Steps of adding wireless pairings: Power on the NVR and camera, connect them by the network cable, right click the system screen, choose Video Manage, click Refresh, and then click Match Code. Move the network cable when video is on.

If it says "resolution too big" after matching code(the new camera is 3MP resolution, the old model recorder resolution may be 2MP), please right click mouse on your monitor screen, left click System setup on the menu bar > Channel Setup on the top > Encode Setup on the left side > choose 1080 for the Resolution > left click Apply and OK to save the setting. Welcome to contact our suppport team to obtain demo video or assistance.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 237 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NOTE: This is a camera for adding to the Cromorc Camera System and does not work alone.When you purchase Cromorc's 8-channel expandable camera system, you can purchase this camera to your camera system to monitor more important corners.

Weatherproof Cameras Suitable for Indoor and Outdoor Wireless Solution Solid IP66 weatherproof metal housings bring in longer service life.Affordable temperature ranges is from -4°F to 122°F (-20°C to 50°C).Note: Power adapter is not waterproof Easy Remote View Powe on the cameras and NVR, the hook up NVR into WAN router via 2.4G WiFi to enjoy live view anywhere anytime in the world.Download and install the APP "EseeCloud" to your iOS & Android smartphone/pad from APP store or Google Play with zero monthly fee.Obtain the latest version of monitoring software EseeCloud(CMS) for Windows PC/Mac from us.
Customize Multiple Alarm Methods for Motion Detection NVR buzzer.APP Notification: Let you know what is happening and happened.

One-Way Audio Between Camera and APP The Audio cameras built in microphone, you can hear your visitors anywhere via the APP.The wireless security camera system not only get streaming live view with video & audio, but also save strong evidence on hard drive about what happens. 3.0 Megapixel (2304*1296) High Definition With selected original chipsets, Cromorc cameras offer crystal-clear high definition video that ensures crisp security footage. AI Human Detection The cameras built in advanced AI Human Detection sensor which will only to be triggered when human body show up in view range, reduce 90% useless alarms. Packing list: 1 x 3.0MP Floodlight Camera(Antenna included)1 x 10 Feet Power Supply (12V-1A) for Cameras1 x Screw Bag (for camera)1 x Owner's Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars worked like oem

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to install
reviews.reviewText: The technical support I received in order to replace 2 cameras was outstanding! They was easy to replace and the cameras work very well during the day and the night. The cormorc security camera system is excellent! We replaced the monitor with a 24 inch screen since our vision is impaired. It was easy to do thanks to the assistance of the technical support person. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This system was extremely easy to install and get operational. When purchased, I was under the impression that there was 2-way audio but that is apparently not the case. Audio does not work at all which is a disappointment. Otherwise the system is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Follow directions. Pull up the proper bar code on monitor and it connects in a couple minutes. Then mount and connect to power and you’re done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are my added additions...
reviews.reviewText: Ohh yes...this was an upgrade to my other security cameras. Very clear vision, easy to install. I like the zoom and other features. Two months ago I purchased the whole unit which came with Four cameras. I found out that the unit can hold up to Eight, so I went ahead and purchased Four more cameras. I love these cameras!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars That this company will help you
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that cromorc does help you but Amazon won't do nothing after 30 days cromorc did help with my nvr /dvr unit and even my camera that went bad Cindy at cromorc is a great help and her team thanks to cromorc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Difficult to pair
reviews.reviewText: Had to return because it would not pair with system like it was supposed to. I have whole system and it is great but this extra camera wouldn’t pair
